txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Ring of Shadow -- Tier 1
Saruman's apprentice, an Orc-defiler of great power, awaits you in the Throne-room of Orthanc. Wielding the Ring of Shadow, he will be a perilous foe to defeat.
